title: Person Of Interest: New Equipment
author: Amonia33
comment: You know what i love about this show? Unlike most vigilante type guys, Reese uses guns like a boss, and yet he still values human life by shooting everyone in the leg rather than killing them unless he has too.
F*cking bad ass series...Jim Caviezel pull that sh*t off perfectly I would love to see him as Batman/Bruce Wayne...he'll knock that sh*t out of the park, pretty confident of that...
he shot 10 rounds at 7 people, 1 person was unhurt, first round didn't hit anyone. I'm assuming reese never misses. It'd really suck to those 1-3 guys who got knee capped 2-4 times
One of my all time favorite scenes in this show, this one and the one at the hotel with the U.S. Marshals.
More like, John Reese goes shopping.
description: Person of interest S01E01 - This Does Not Belong To Me. Picture courtesy of CBS.
